data.name: Power Overload Test
data.description: Test the maximum limit of core power; increase the maximum AP by 100.

data.name: Output Overload Test
data.description: It will cause an intended electrical output overload to accumulate data. It will increase the speed of movement by 2%.

data.name: Handling System Exception
data.description: Secure the missing exception handling of the reload system; increase the loading speed by 2%.

data.name: Barrel Durability Test
data.description: Conduct a durability test of the barrel. Launch speed increases by 1%.

data.name: New Material Elasticity Test
data.description: Test the elasticity of the new material to be used when strengthening parts. Increases jump power by 2%.

data.name: Gas Pressure Experiment
data.description: Analyze the pressure intensity for each gas to find the optimal gas. Increase the hovering gas output by 2%.

data.name: Thermal Power Data Analysis
data.description: Analyze the firepower data according to the weapon you use. Increases the attack power of all weapons by 2%.

data.name: Signal Amplification Experiment
data.description: It conducts signal amplification experiments to accumulate radar data. Rock-on maximum distance increases by 2%.
